dc.title: The USAP Portal: Science and Support in Antarctica - Welcome to the USAP Portal
dc.description: USAP.gov is the main repository for information about the United States Antarctic Program. The site is designed for the general public, news agencies, academia, and program participants. Topics include News, About the USAP, About the Continent, About USAP Participants, The Antarctic Treaty, Researchers and Science Projects, Science Summaries and Discoveries, Videos, Slide Shows, Maps, and Opportunities to Participate.
